trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access a delegate across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Define um contrato que os componentes podem usar para acessar um delegado entre o domínio do aplicativo e os limites do processo.

trans-unit.source: To invoke a delegate, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para invocar um delegado, use o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to an event or remove a delegate from an event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that is returned by <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um delegado a um evento ou remover um delegado de um evento, chame o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> método o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> que é retornado por <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> ou <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate to the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Passar um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> que representa o representante para a `parameters` parâmetro <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" /> that specifies the delegate parameters.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" /> que especifica os parâmetros do delegado.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the delegate that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o delegado que este <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> that specifies the return value of the invoked delegate.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> que especifica o valor retornado do delegado invocado.
